altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.vi: Tài khoản bí mật của vợ yêu

description.vi:
Yamada Sosuke, người có một cô con gái đang học tiểu học, tình cờ xem được đoạn video ghi lại cảnh người có vẻ là vợ anh đang quan hệ t.ì.n.h d.ụ.c trong một tài khoản nặc danh. Hơn nữa, đoạn video còn được quay tại trường tiểu học mà con gái anh đang theo học.
Chủ tài khoản bí mật có thực sự là vợ anh không? Và cô ấy đang ngoại tình với ai?

altTitles.ja: 僕たちは繁殖をやめた

description.en:
The third year university student Shin Momotari dreams of creating the greatest movie, and one day he has a chance encounter with Hitomi Oosako, a girl beautiful enough to be mistaken as an actress. And, it just so happens that she is an entering student at the university Shin attends.

Guided by fate, the two of them gradually begin to fall for each other. However, there is something that neither of them know. The one they've fallen in love with is related to them by blood, their sibling.

And so opens the curtain on a pure and forbidden love story, woven by the two who must never be together.
description.pt:
Quero fazer o melhor filme de todos! Foi abraçando esse sonho que o estudante universitário Momotari Shin encontrou a linda atriz, segundo ele, Osako Hitomi.   
Ela, de alguma forma, era caloura na mesma universidade que Shin frequenta. Levados pelo destino, Shin e Hitomi se atraem. Contudo, havia algo que os dois não sabiam.  
O fato de que eram irmãos de sangue. Começa uma história de um inocente amor proibido de um casal conectado por laços inseparáveis.

description.en: Worst but New Edition
description.vi: Liên minh Kurotaki sụp đổ, quyền lực của King Joe ở Housen dần bị mai một, Zetton bại trận trước Guriko đưa Suzuran vào thế hỗn loạn, Vũ Trang Chiến Tuyến ngày càng mạnh mẽ và bền bỉ... Trước tình cảnh đó thì ở Toaru bất ngờ xuất hiện một chàng trai đến từ ngoại thành mang tên Tsukishima Hana - kẻ mang ước mơ trở thành thủ lĩnh đầu tiên của toàn bộ Cao Trung Nam Sinh Suzuran vốn luôn hỗn loạn!

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon

description.en:
Because of being just, before even becoming specialist, Jisoo Han, a 3rd year of general surgery, has died.
Was it an angel, demon, or some unknown system of the world? Because of his good deeds, he got a chance to live again.
But he was resurrected as a dead man who was killed by mountain bandits. But this body… Is it the body of a great legendary surgeon?!
A generation of heroes with an endless battle, about in the year 200. As a great legendary surgeon of the 200’s, he tries to stand up to it……
An unexpected and extraordinary journey of a young surgeon, who fell into the world of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, has began!

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%ED%83%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%9C-%EC%99%B8%EA%B3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC/2736)
description.fr:
Était-ce un ange, un démon ou autre chose qui m'a ressuscité ?
Jisoo Han, un major de troisième année en chirurgie générale, a perdu la vie en raison de sa personnalité droite. Cependant, grâce aux bonnes actions qu'il a faites dans sa vie, il a été ressuscité dans le corps d'un homme mort qui a été tué par des bandits de montagne. Mais ce corps… Est-ce le corps d'un grand chirurgien légendaire ?! Maintenant, dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes de guerres et de héros [CE 200]. Jisoo essaie de survivre et de se tenir debout en tant que chirurgien légendaire ……
Le voyage inattendu et extraordinaire d'un jeune chirurgien, tombé dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes, a commencé !
description.ko:
정의로운 성격 때문에 전문의는 커녕, 목숨까지 잃은 일반외과 전공 3년차 한진수.

천사인가, 악마인가, 아님 알 수 없는 시스템인가.
평소 쌓은 선행 덕분에 부활의 기회를 얻게 된다.

산적 떼에게 죽은 몸으로 부활하게 된 한진수.
그런데 이 몸이 전설의 명의名醫 화타?!

전란이 끊임없는 영웅들의 시대, 혼란한 후한 말.
한진수, 그는 후한 말 명의名醫 화타로서 우뚝 서려 한다…….

<삼국지연의> 속 세상에 떨어진 젊은 외과의사가 펼치는 
기상천외한 모험이 시작된다!"

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.tr: Katagiri Yuichi, arkadaşların paranın öneminden daha önemli olduğuna inanır, ancak yetersiz fonların zorluklarını da bilir. Lise gezisine gitmeyi taahhüt ettiği dört en iyi arkadaşıyla birlikte gitmeyi planlar ve bu yüzden para biriktirmek için çalışır. Ancak, sınıfın topladığı paranın hepsi çalınır! Şüphe, Yuichi'nin arkadaşları Sawaragi Shiho ve Shibe Makoto üzerine düşer.Kısa bir süre sonra, beşi kaçırılır ve garip bir odada, kısa ömürlü bir animenin karakteriyle uyanırlar. Görünüşe göre, onlardan biri büyük bir borcu ödemek için bir "arkadaşlık oyunu" na girmiştir. Ancak kimdi ve neden böyle bir borcu vardı? Sınıftan parayı çalıp oyunun giriş ücretini ödeyebilirler miydi? Katagiri ve en iyi arkadaşları, birbirlerine olan inançlarını test edecek veya yok edecek psikolojik oyunlarda başarılı olmak zorunda kalacaklar.
description.vi: Katagiri Yuichi tin rằng bạn bè quan trọng hơn tiền bạc, nhưng cậu cũng hiểu rõ sự khó khăn khi túng thiếu. Cậu làm việc chăm chỉ để tiết kiệm tiền cho chuyến đi dã ngoại thời trung học, vì cậu đã hứa với bốn người bạn thân của mình rằng tất cả sẽ cùng đi. Tuy nhiên, sau khi gom đủ tiền, toàn bộ quỹ lớp bị trộm mất! Sự nghi ngờ đổ lên đầu hai người bạn của Yuichi, Sawaragi Shiho và Shibe Makoto. Ngay sau đó, cả 5 người bị bắt cóc, và thấy mình tỉnh dậy trong 1 căn phòng kỳ lạ, cùng 1 nhân vật hoạt hình. Có vẻ như, một trong số 5 người đã đẩy bọn họ vào "trò chơi tình bạn" nhằm mong gỡ lại món tiền nào đó. Nhưng đó là ai, và tại sao bọn họ lại phải mang nợ? Phải chăng đã có kẻ trộm tiền của lớp để trả tiền được vào trò chơi này? Katagiri và những người bạn thân của mình buộc phải thắng trong trò chơi. Sẽ là bài kiểm tra tình bạn, hay phá hủy niềm tin giữa bọn họ?  Tên tiếng việt: Friends game - Trò chơi tình bạn
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

description.en:
A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!
Novice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.
A fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!

title.en: Using My Cooking Skills in a Murim World

altTitles.en: A Bowl of Black Bean Noodles Would Be Served by the Son-in-Law of Zhuge Family

altTitles.pt-br: Usando minhas Habilidades Culinárias no Murim

description.en:
With a dream to become the ultimate Chinese cuisine chef, our protagonist finds himself inexplicably transported to the Song Dynasty in China! However, upon awakening, he discovers that he possesses no martial arts skills whatsoever. All that remains are the culinary techniques he mastered in his previous life. Surprisingly, these dishes… receive an overwhelmingly positive response!

Can he, with a single bowl of Jjajangmyeon, truly conquer the martial world?
Will he be able to captivate the Central Plains with his Jjajangmyeon and lead a successful second life in this era?
description.pt-br:
Com o sonho de se tornar o melhor chef da culinária chinesa, nosso protagonista se vê inexplicavelmente transportado para a Dinastia Song na China! No entanto, ao acordar, ele descobre que não possui nenhuma habilidade em artes marciais. Tudo o que resta são as técnicas culinárias que ele dominou em sua vida anterior. Surpreendentemente, esses pratos… recebem uma resposta extremamente positiva!

Ele pode, com uma única tigela de Jjajangmyeon, realmente conquistar o mundo marcial? Ele será capaz de cativar as Planícies Centrais com seu Jjajangmyeon e levar uma segunda vida bem-sucedida nesta era?

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu

altTitles.ja: 異世界で水の大精霊やってます。

description.en:
When Nagi Saejima, a carefree high school student, wakes up from a doze, he became a lake in a different world!? Nagi, w finds out that he is the "Great Spirit of Water" whose main body is the lake, heals those who suffer from injuries and diseases with the power that dwells in himself. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and summoned by a boy. That encounter will greatly change the fate of Nagi.
Alphapolis's 2nd Next Generation Fantasy Cup "Unique Character Award" winner, long-awaited comicalize!! "Since I was revered, I have to save it with the power of God's healing."

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
The second season of Cho Seok's Tidal Universe masterpiece, Planetary Human. So… prepare yourself to be mindfucked.

altTitles.fr: Tsugai : Daemons of the Shadow Realm

description.en:
The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)
description.ja: 山奥の小さな村落に住む少年のユルは、野鳥を狩り、大自然の中で静かに暮らしていた。しかしユルの双子の妹のアサは、何故か村の奥にある牢の中で「おつとめ」を果たしているという。それはまるで幽閉されているかのように…。穏やかな村に浮かぶ不自然な謎、この村に隠された秘密とは一体…!?
description.ru: Сюжет расскажет о мальчике Юру из далекой горной деревни, который проводит свое время в единении с природой, охотясь за птицами. Но однажды его сестру-близнеца Асу призвали служить в тюрьме, находящейся в центре деревни. После этого Юру постепенно разгадывает тайну, скрытую в его тихой деревне...
description.pt-br: A trama acompanha Yuru, um jovem que vive em uma aldeia remota na montanha, onde vive da caça e se conecta com a natureza. Após Asa, sua irmã gêmea, ser chamada para servir na prisão da vila, Yuru começa a desvendar um mistério sobrenatural que envolve sua aldeia.

title.en: Koi De Tokeru Girudo Za Lily

altTitles.ja: 恋でとけるギルド・ザ・リリー

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Tan Chảy Trong Hội Lily

description.en:
Former Host No.1 – Asuka Loses Her Throne To Rookie Kyouji!

Asuka, who has always held the No.1 Host position for many years, was suddenly usurped by Kyouji, a brand new rookie, in a spectacular way. Determined to regain the No.1 position, Asuka tries her best but continuously fails, even having to ask Kyouji for help to solve the problem...

Newly emerging typical bad boy No.1 vs Arrogant good boy former No.1 - 
Romantic night love story for crazy fans officially begins!

altTitles.ja: 微熱なつまさき(ラブライブ!)

description.en: Nozomi becomes more conscious of Eli after overhearing her conversation with Nico. Will Nozomi finally be able to overcome her apprehensions and allow herself to fall in love?

title.en: The Strongest Chef in Another World

description.en:
Kang Taeyang, a chef who chased his dreams. One day, he lost everything due to a single choice. But an opportunity came to Taeyang, who was spending hopeless days working odd jobs. 

[Aurora is hiring employees.] 

A single line of text changed everything for him!

title.en: Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi - Shiitagerareta Moto Yuusha wa Mirai no Sekai o Yoyuu de Ikinuku (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.ja: 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ~虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く~ (GIGATOON Studio)

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Magician With Inferior Eyes ~The Oppressed Ex-hero Survives the Future World With Ease~

description.en: In a world where eye color determines one’s magical prowess, there existed a mage of unparalleled might, Abel. Feared even by allies, he transfers his soul to the distant future in search of an ideal realm. Yet, in this new era, his once-celebrated eyes are dubbed “Inferior Eyes” and he becomes the butt of ridicule. Harassed by high-borne nobles and unjustly discriminated against, Abel discovers that while magic has diminished in this technologically advanced future, his Amber Eyes conceal a power beyond human comprehension. This hero from the past is set to revolutionize the magic of the future!

Furutto is a cat that leads a double life. On one hand, he's the companion of a young woman in an apartment building named Kujirai, who feeds him (when she hasn't gambled away her meager manga-assistant's paycheck) and spends time with him in her apartment. On the other hand, he wants to keep his street cred as a stray cat and spends a good amount of time hanging out with the other strays, trying to steal food out of trash cans and rumbling with the cats from the next town over.

title.en: Ore Dake 2-Shuume Gachizei - Tsuyo Sugite Game Balance wo Hakai Shita

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ2周目ガチ勢～強すぎてゲームバランスを破壊した～

altTitles.en: The Only New Game+ Hardcore Gamer ~I'm So Overpowered, I Shattered the Game's Balance~

description.en:
Rise to the top with knowledge and skills in your second life!

Former pro gamer Itsuki, who concealed his controversial past and worked as a VTuber, is attacked by problematic fans after getting doxxed, resulting in an accident that makes him lose consciousness. He wakes up only to find himself 10 years in the past, right after the launch of the hugely popular VRMMO Metasense!

There’s no need to hide his past in this world. Equipped with knowledge and skills from his first playthrough, becoming a top gamer and streamer is effortless!

I… will stand at the pinnacle of Metasense!

altTitles.ja: 微熱なゆびさき(ラブライブ!)

description.en: Thanks to witnessing a love confession between two girls and chancing upon a NicoMaki moment, Eli realises her feelings towards Nozomi. How will she deal with her feelings, especially since Nozomi constantly hints at her apprehensions on falling in love?

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.en:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！　憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: The Demon King Dad and His Hero Daughter

description.en:
Selene, the daughter who dreams of becoming a hero, and Shion, the demon king who adopted her. Shion has to conceal his true identity at all costs, unable to cheer on his daughter’s dreams or attempt to stop her.
This is the story of Selene’s journey to becoming a true hero amidst this dilemma… Or is it the parenting story of the demon king?!

altTitles.ja: ガチャ王〜神のゲーマー〜

description.en: Ryuuki has been betrayed by the people he trusted and has fallen to the lowest ranks of society. Hoping for his luck to turn for the better, he spends his days playing at the “Randombox”. His aim is the SSR-rank reward, the right to make an account for the game “Labyrinth”! Sadly, not only did he actually manage to pull his greatest wish, but that too got stolen from him. However, that’s when Ryuuchi’s true luck started! “As long as you can pull it, you will be able to use The System and defy all logic”. Everything stolen from me… But I will take it all back through Gacha!!

altTitles.en: The Worthy One to the Heaven

altTitles.es: El Guerrero Digno de los Cielos

description.en: In an age of evil where all humans are being hunted by Spirits, chaos broke out after a Monster destroyed an entire city, thus igniting a battle between gods and demons. But among so much darkness there will always be light, and this will come from the hands of Ding Xiao who will seek to fight against these evil spirits, thus becoming the greatest spiritual master, although the question is: will he be the one to Ascend to touch the sky? Or will he be tempted to turn Evil?
description.es: En una era de maldad donde todos los humanos están siendo cazados por Espíritus, se desató el caos luego de que un Monstruo incitado por la codicia destruyera una ciudad completa, iniciando así una batalla entre dioses y demonios. Pero entre tanta oscuridad siempre habrá luz, y esta vendrá de las manos de Ding Xiao quien buscara luchar contra estos espíritus malignos, convirtiéndose así en el más grande maestro espiritual, aunque la duda es: ¿Él será el indicado para Ascender hasta tocar el cielo o será tentado para volverse Malvado?

altTitles.en: Become a Legend as an All-Rounder

description.en: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!

In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!

This gritty, action-packed tale marks the first full series from the up-and-coming talent who captivated audiences with the one-shots “Death Salmon Hunter” and “Composter Funeral”!

altTitles.en: The story about my office noona

description.en:
Ahn was a mature and attractive older woman I met through my company's task force. Wise and caring, that's how I became captivated with her… However, she was also a woman with a child.  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nianshangjiejiedeyouhuo/list?title_no=1562)

Tatsuhiko Shiroyama hates being stuck in the boonies. Greetings from strangers feels fake, part-time job prospects are limited, and he's been "blessed" with the nickname "Niyayama" from his classmates due to his creepy, unsociable attempts at smiling. He turned to the radio as a means to escape, and thinks about nothing more than saving up for a move to Tokyo where he can explore his passions. But Tatsuhiko's life changes forever when he saves a rich CEO from a rice paddy and is set up with his granddaughter, the equally as shy and antisocial Tamiko Mita. Together, the two stumble through the nuances of "dating", and Tatsuhiko's dreary days become a whole lot brighter.

A post-apocalyptic world is ruled by gods.

Driven by the desire to avenge his family, slain by a god, he plunged into the abyss of death. 

"O Void, lend me your power, The power to slay the gods…!"

altTitles.vi: Ta Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta Ở Tokyo Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta, Sáng Tạo Ra Đô Thị Truyền Thuyết

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

description.en: Ye Wutian, a brilliant doctor from 2089, somehow time-travels back to the year 2019 in a lab experiment explosion. He wakes up in a wild mountain, and then manages to save a girl, Li Wan'er who's been bitten by a venomous snake. With his apparently superior knowledge in medicine, Ye Wutian embarks on an amazing journey in the beginning of the 21st century…

title.en: The Ten Thousand Clans Invasion: Guardian of the Rear

altTitles.zh: 万族入侵：全民参战，我留守后方

altTitles.zh-ro: Wan Zu Ru Qin: Quanmin Canzhan, Wo Liushou Houfang

altTitles.en: Invasion of All Races: All the People Join the War, I Stay Behind

description.en: Invasion of the Ten Thousand Clans, universal superpowers, the era beyond time has arrived! In this age, all citizens are drafted to resist the foreign races and defend against external humiliation. Nan Ziying, at the tender age of adulthood, chooses to stay behind at the recruitment center, serving as logistical support. Many soldiers are disappointed, the youth scorn him, and white-haired elders take up arms and leave, leaving him behind with only women, children, and the elderly to guard the rear. Later, Nan Ziying awakens five great abilities and silently prepares. In this era where countless clans reign supreme and the times are filled with tragic heroism, ‘I am the calamity of these ten thousand clans!'

title.en: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World's Top Ten Masters

description.en:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.

Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

title.en: The Magic Genius of the Marquis House

altTitles.en: The Magic Genius of the Marquis

description.en:
"To stay alive… I have no choice but to become a genius. From today, I’ll do my best, so please support me." 
Lee Hyun-woo finds himself possessing Kyle Seltarion, an extra character from a game where he used to reign as the world’s number one player.  
Considering the game’s storyline, he soon faces the imminent death of Kyle, who, on top of being on death's door, can't use magic or aura and has a terrible reputation. How did he end up in the body of such a character?  
However, after discovering a new talent, he learns to harness mana and begins to shift his attributes and reputation with knowledge of hidden routes gained through grinding in the game.  
His immediate goal is to save his own life, but that goal is closely linked to the impending global catastrophe...  
To overcome this situation, he needs to gather allies and boost his reputation! It's time to turn his past, which was a reckless mess, around and move into a new phase!

On the Jiuzhou continent, humans, demons, various races coexist. The human race is led by the Daqing Immortal Dynasty, where mortals and cultivators live together. However, cultivation requires a one-in-ten-thousand talent. When mortals cause trouble, there is the patrol camp to deal with them. When nobles cause trouble, there is the Jinyiwei. But when cultivators and demons cause trouble with their sorcery, only the Sword-Wielding Person can bring peace. The Sword-Wielding Person is no different from an ordinary person; with a single Sword, they can easily slay cultivators.

altTitles.en: The Demonic Cult Leader Is Too Reluctant

description.en:
Despite my position as the young leader of the Demonic Cult, all I ever wanted was a simple life.

However, after my father, Heavenly Demon Asura, passed away and a rebellion erupted, I was forced to flee the cult. I believed I could finally live the life I had always longed for, but... my father's confidant, Poong Cheon, insisted that I must become the 16th cult leader.

Was it just my imagination, or was something more ominous than becoming the leader of the Demonic Cult about to unfold in the future?

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

altTitles.th: Biorg Trinity โรคร้ายกลายพันธุ์มนุษย์

altTitles.ja: バイオーグ・トリニティ

description.en: Opening holes in the palms of both hands, the “Bio Bug” disease enables people to absorb and then fuse with things they like. description.en:
“Onii-san, congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”

“M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”

My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances, I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore, my partner is a plain girl, Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school, I went through a bad experience. Ever since then, I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought, but…

“…Well then, who’s your favorite heroine right now?”

Turns out, she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.

“Err, since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”

And, the moment I let my guard down, she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…

“Just between you and me, I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”

It’s a secret from everyone else, but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But, Yuuka’s true self, which she only shows when she’s alone with me, is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka, starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!
description.ja: 親の都合で結婚させられることになった高校生の俺。お相手は――なんとアイドルゲームの声優だった!!まさかの“中の人”との同棲生活がスタート!　2人だけの新生活は、甘くて可愛いしかない!?
description.pt-br:
“Nii-san, parabéns pelo seu casamento. Esta pessoa é sua noiva. ”
"M-meu nome é Watanae Yuuka... estou na mesma classe que você ..."

Meu nome é Sakata Yuuichi. Estou no segundo ano do ensino médio.
Devido às circunstâncias dos meus pais, de repente vou me casar ..?
Além disso, minha parceira é uma garota comum, Watanae-san.
Durante meu terceiro ano do ensino médio, passei por uma experiência ruim. Desde então, só me interessei por heroínas 2D. Não há absolutamente nenhuma maneira de eu me interessar por uma garota 3D.
Foi o que pensei, mas ...

“...Bem, então quem é a sua heroína favorita agora?”

Acontece que ela era na verdade uma otaku que fala bastante quando você fica intimo dela.
Ela sempre se envolveria com prazer em nossas conversas. Ela me mostrou coisas que eu nunca esperaria de uma garota da minha classe.

"Eh, já que vamos morar juntos... Tudo bem se eu te chamar de Yuu-kun?"

E, no momento em que baixei a guarda, ela imediatamente tentaria encurtar a distância entre nós.
O que mais…

“Só entre você e eu, na verdade sou a dubladora de Izumi Yuuna de『Alice Stage』. Obrigado por sempre me apoiar! ”

É um segredo para todos os outros, mas acontece que ela é na verdade a dubladora da minha heroína favorita?!
Estou interessado apenas em heroínas 2D!
Mas, o verdadeiro eu de Yuuka, que ela só mostra quando está sozinha comigo, não é nada além de fofa! 
Esta é a minha história com Yuuka, começando como noivos. Um romcom comovente e caótico!

description.en:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
description.fr:
L'humanité a perdu la guerre. Des hommes d'affaires ont trahi leurs compatriotes, et des chasseurs se sont transformés en monstres, piétinant d'innombrables cadavres humains, tout cela pour le profit. Les créatures d'un autre monde ont envahi le nôtre, le conquérant peu à peu comme un feu dévorant. Mais alors que tout semblait perdu, Zuo Chi est apparu.
"Autrefois, vous envahissiez notre monde avec jubilation. Pourquoi pleurez-vous maintenant ?"

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

description.en:
Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school.

For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last…

This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom!
___
**Character Designer:** [Chigusa Minori](https://mangadex.org/author/8543c0af-463f-41ba-b029-fb2d10243fba)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67850)
description.ja:
品行方正、成績トップの同級生美少女・宇佐見。校内で俺をライバル視して突っかかる彼女には放課後、別の顔がある。彼女は放課後、ゲーセンで遊び、学校では想像できない無邪気な笑顔を見せるのだ。俺は宇佐見と仲良くなるため、校内では寄り添い、放課後は一緒に遊ぶ。それぞれの場所で仲を深め、ついに……学校帰りの宇佐見から告白が!?

---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202311futago)
description.es-la: Usami, una hermosa compañera de clase, modelo de buena conducta y la mejor en calificaciones, me ve como su rival en la escuela. Sin embargo, después de clases, ella muestra una faceta completamente diferente. Después de la escuela, juega en la sala de juegos y muestra una inocente sonrisa que no podrías imaginar viendo en la escuela. Para acercarme a Usami, la acompañó en la escuela y jugamos juntos después de clases. En cada lugar, nuestra amistad se profundiza, ¡y finalmente se abre el telón de una conmovedora comedia romántica de triángulo amoroso!
description.pt-br:
Usami é uma linda colega de classe, com bons costumes e notas altas. Na escola, ela vê Sakuto como seu rival. Mas quando ele a encontra depois da escola, ele vê um lado diferente dela. Ela estava jogando no fliperama depois das aulas e tinha aquele sorriso inocente que ninguém poderia imaginar nela na escola.

Para se dar bem com ela, ele se aproxima dela na escola e depois joga com ela depois da escola. Cada um deles tem seus lugares onde podem aprofundar seus laços e, finalmente...

Este é o início de uma comédia romântica de triângulo amoroso comovente!
